author: PR
title: OGDCL organizes 3-day free surgical eye camp at Chak Naurang Oil Field in Chakwal
text: ISLAMABAD-The Oil and Gas Development Company Limited (OGDCL), as part of its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives, organized a three-day Free Surgical Eye Camp at its CSR Dispensary in Chak Naurang, located in the Chakwal district of Punjab in collaboration with the Al-Shifa Eye Trust Hospital. The eye camp, held from December 24 to 26, aimed to provide essential eye care services to the local community. During the free eye camp, a total number of 1290 patients were screened at the OPD and received essential preliminary assessments. Among them, 762 patients were provided with vision glasses, and 40 patients received post-operation dark glasses. Special glasses were provided to 285 patients, addressing specific visual needs. Moreover, 55 patients underwent Lab/COVID-19 tests during the camp. Furthermore, a total number of 40 eye surgeries were performed, contributing to the long-term improvement of the patients’ eye health. Patients who availed themselves of the services expressed their complete satisfaction with the overall process at the eye camp. OGDCL, under its CSR program, covered all expenses incurred during the three-day camp, including laser/phaco surgery, provision of vision glasses, and medicines. OGDCL is committed to enhancing the health and well-being of communities in and around its operational areas. Through corporate social responsibility initiatives, OGDCL aims to positively impact the lives of residents and contribute to the overall prosperity of the regions it serves. The Executive Director (HR/Admin) and General Manager (CSR) of OGDCL also visited the eye camp site and met with staff of eye camp and also patients and other community members. The local community thanked to OGDCL for such wonderful facility at their door step.

organizations.name: oil and gas development company limited

author: Katya Soldak
title: Thursday, August 22. Russia’s War On Ukraine: News And Information From Ukraine
text:
Dispatches from Ukraine. Day 911.
Frontline. On Aug. 22, Russian forces dropped two guided bombs on the village of Esman in Ukraine’s northern Sumy oblast , the Sumy regional prosecutor’s office said . The mid-day attack resulted in the deaths of two men, aged 74 and 67. The wife of one of the deceased men was also injured and hospitalized. Ukrainian prosecutors, in collaboration with law enforcement, are investigating the shelling as a war crime.
Kozacha Lopan, a village in northeastern Kharkiv oblast, less than five miles from the Russian border, came under Russian artillery fire on Aug. 21, Ukraine’s ministry of internal affairs said . The strike reduced part of the village council building to rubble, trapping several people in the basement beneath. One woman in her 50’s was successfully rescued. Emergency operations are ongoing.
A Russian strike on the village of Malokaterynivka in southeastern Zaporizhzhia oblast killed a 14-year-old and left seven other children seriously injured, regional governor Ivan Fedorov said on Aug. 20. The strike hit a children’s café, Lavanda, and also injured two adults. The 14-year-old boy who died, succumbed to his injuries at the hospital. “The terrorist [Russia] maims civilians and will not stop, even at children. We have to stop them,” Fedorov urged.
National.
President Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited the northern border region of Sumy and meet with top military commander Oleksandr Syrskyi and Sumy’s military governor on Aug. 22. Syrskyi updated the president on the operational situation across all active combat zones, focusing on the frontline’s hot spots and the Kursk region of Russia, where Ukraine recently captured yet another locality and more Russian military troops . Sumy military governor Volodymyr Artyukh reported a decrease in artillery shelling and civilian casualties in his oblast since the start of the Kursk operation. “Our operation in the Kursk region, our combat work is ongoing,” said Zelenskyy. “I thank all our guys, all the units, for further replenishment of the exchange fund,” he added, referring to Russian troops captured for eventual POW exchange to free Ukrainian troops held by Russia.
Ukraine’s parliament, the Verkhovna Rada, passed important legislation this week, including protections for foreigners fighting for Ukraine and adopting the founding statute of the International Criminal Court (ICC). On Aug. 20, the Rada granted temporary residence, immigration rights, and a path to citizenship to foreigners and stateless individuals fighting for Ukraine. The law permits these individuals and their families to obtain legal status in Ukraine even with expired passport/documents.
MORE FOR YOU Hackers Force Chrome Users To Hand Over Google Passwords, Here’s How Google Chrome Deadline—You Have 72 Hours To Update Your Browser Apple Forced Into Drastic iPhone 16 Pro Downgrade On Aug. 21, the Rada ratified the Rome Statute of the ICC. This move will strengthen Ukraine’s ability to prosecute Russian war crimes, and brings it closer to officially joining the ICC, a condition European Union membership.
Parliament also passed a law banning religious organizations connected to the Russian Orthodox Church , which supports the Kremlin’s invasion of Ukraine, on the same day. Known as the "ban on the Moscow church," the law is particularly targeted at the Ukrainian Orthodox Church (UOC), a satellite of the Russian Orthodox Church. While the UOC has declared that it is independent from Russian influence, it is widely mistrusted. individual parishes will have nine months to cut ties with the Russian Orthodox Church.
World.
The Netherlands has purchased 51 specialized mobile radar units for detecting drones on behalf of Ukraine , the Dutch Ministry of Defense announced on Aug. 21. The ministry ordered the units from Robin Radar Systems, a technology company in The Hague. These advanced radars are designed to detect small drones and have the capability to distinguish them from other flying objects, such as birds. A key feature of these systems is their ability to operate while moving, making them more difficult for adversaries to locate and neutralize. They will arrive in Ukraine in three tranches in the last quarter of 2024, where they will be deployed to counter Russian drone attacks.
A 20-million-euro ($22 million) support package, funded by Germany, will provide grants to internally displaced persons, returning Ukrainians, and battered communities in Sumy, Chernihiv, and Kyiv oblasts . This assistance is part of the “ Resilience+ : Economic Integration of IDPs and Conflict-Affected Persons” project, a collaboration between Ukraine’s economy ministry and the International Organization for Migration (IOM), funded by Germany’s Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ). According to Tatiana Berezhna, deputy minister of economy for Ukraine, the project will provide 150 grants of up to $7,800 for micro-enterprises, 90 grants of up to $22 thousand for small businesses, and 45 grants of up to $17 thousand for micro-enterprise startups in the Sumy, Chernihiv, and Kyiv regions. The package also includes education/work training grants for individuals. “We are grateful to our partners for their help and willingness to expand our capabilities to support residents of the war-affected areas, entrepreneurs who continue to work there or restore their businesses,” Berezhna said.
By Daria Dzysiuk, Karina L. Tahiliani
Katya Soldak Following
Forbes Ukraine

author: world today news
title: Leak Reveals Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and New Pokémon Gen 10 in Development
text:
 door Editing
 published on Thursday October 17, 2024 about 21:17 •
 2 I read
In short A new generation of codenamed Pokémon Gen 10 is in development. The Nintendo Switch 2 , with code Once may be released at the end of 2024. A major data breach at Game Freak , the developer behind the Pokémon series, has revealed details about the Nintendo Switch 2. That reports Indy 100 . Leaked information indicates that a new generation is currently in existence Pokémon is being developed and that this game should be released for the Nintendo Switch 2 at the end of 2024.
Nintendo Switch 2 Although this news has not yet been confirmed, Nintendo previously announced that they are expecting it by March 2025 details on the Switch 2 successor to be revealed. While there have been no official updates since its announcement in May, recent reports from Blade, a video game accessory company, claim that the console is “finished” and “ready,” with launched in March or April next year. . However, if we can believe the leak, that could be a bit earlier as well.
Game Freak has acknowledged the data breach in an official statement, in which they sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and concern they have caused.

author: Srijony Das
title: Amitabh Bachchan Talks About Helen's Escape From Burma War, Says, 'Had To Trek Through Miles...'
text:
Helen is one of the finest actresses in Indian cinema. She was born in Rangoon, present-day Burma, to Anglo-Indian parents. Her way towards the film industry was a rough and distant path for the longest time, since she and her family had to escape. Coming back to her film career, the diva appeared in over 1000 films, and was especially known for her gorgeous beauty and swift dance moves. In her personal life, Helen is married to eminent screenwriter, Salim Khan. Amitabh Bachchan recalls Helen’s ordeal of escaping from Burma War
In the recent episode of Kaun Banega Crorepati , Amitabh Bachchan asked a contestant a question for Rs. 25 lakhs, about the one actress who was born in Myanmar and later escaped with her family to India. While the contestant couldn’t answer the same and decided to quit, Big B later revealed that the actress was none other than Helen. Talking more about the same, he said: you may also like 10 Celeb Couples Who Did Not Let Their Distraught Relationship Affect Their Families Arbaaz Khan On His Parents, Salim Khan And Salma Khan's Equation: 'My Dad Holds My Mom's Hand...' Arbaaz Khan Reveals Why He Calls Step-Mom, 'Helen Aunty', And How She Was Introduced To The Family Helen Recalls Her First Meeting With Salim Khan, Reveals She Tried Her Best Not To Hurt Salma Khan Jaya Bachchan Saved Amitabh Bachchan's Dooming Career, Helped Him Become 'Angry Young Man' Helen Recalls When She Began Dating Salim Khan, His First Wife, Salma Had Gone Through A Tough Time Salim Khan Shares 'Sasur's' Objections During His Marriage, Reveals His Hindu Name Given By In-Laws Salim Khan On Falling In Love With Helen Despite Being Married, Says 'Mera Koi Aisa Iraada Nahi Tha' Arbaaz Khan Questions Father, Salim Khan About His Romance With Helen In '80s And How He Handled It When Salman Khan Recalled How Salma Khan Was 'Hurt' After Her Husband, Salim's Second Marriage
“Helen and her family escaped Myanmar...called Burma back then. In order to escape and come to India, they had to trek through miles of wilderness passing through rivers, mountains and forests. In order to escape from the Japanese occupation of Burma, she had to do this in 1943. She became a popular actress in our film industry. Watching her dance would leave one enthralled.”
Recommended Read: Akshay Kumar Reacts To Shikhar Dhawan's Emotional Post For His Son, Says, 'Nothing Is More Painful'
Big B heaps praises about Helen for always taking care of everyone
Speaking more about Helen, Amitabh Bachchan remarked how he has had the good fortune of working with the former in quite a few films. He talked about her generosity and compassion for everyone. In his words:
“I had the good fortune of working with her in a few films. She's a kind and compassionate woman. She used to look after everyone. We pray she stays in good health. She's old now.”
Helen once recalled the time she started dating Salim Khan, called it a troubled time for his wife, Salma Khan
For the unversed, Helen began dating Salim Khan at a time when the latter was married to his first wife, Salma Khan and parents of their kids, Salman, Arbaaz, Sohail and Alvira. Previously, in an interview with her step-son, Arbaaz on his show, The Invincibles , the diva talked about the time when she began dating Salim Khan and revealed how the time was especially hard for his first wife, Salma Khan.

Helen felt guilty about marrying Salim Khan In yet another of her interview with Pinkvilla, Helen once remarked how she felt guilty upon marrying Salim Khan as she was disturbed by the fact that he was already married. However, she already added that Salim always appeared to her as a class apart men from the others. In her words:
“The fact that Salim was a married man did disturb me and I did felt guilty in the beginning. Something about Salim set him apart from the rest of the industry men. I respected him tremendously as he tried to help me out without trying to exploit me.”
What do you think about this unheard anecdote about Helen?

author: Ximena Ochoa
title: Vuelve el sol y cesan las lluvias en CDMX: Clima para el viernes 11 de octubre en México
text:
Vuelve el sol y cesan las lluvias en CDMX: Este es el pronóstico del clima para el viernes 11 de octubre en México Tras semanas de lluvias, el clima para el viernes 11 de octubre se prevé estable y en el centro del país volverá a asomarse el sol. 10 octubre 2024 21:26hrs 2 minutos de lectura. Compartir: Compartir Facebook X Whatsapp Telegram Copiar Enlace Enlace Copiado URL Escrito por: Ximena Ochoa Getty
De acuerdo al pronóstico meteorológico para el viernes 10 de octubre , en gran parte del país se presentarán una mezcla de condiciones, desde lluvias intensas en ciertas zonas hasta cielos despejados en otras .
En el caso de la Ciudad de México , el clima se mantendrá estable , sin lluvias y con temperaturas agradables durante el día, aunque se esperan noches frescas .
También te puede interesar: Huracán Leslie: Su trayecto en el Atlántico y qué tan lejos está de México
El huracán Leslie sigue su curso en el Océano Atlántico; es importante mantenerse al tanto de su trayectoria y posibles cambios en los próximos días.
México Ver nota adn40 Siempre Conmigo . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp y lleva la información en la palma de tu mano.
Clima despejado gracias a sistema anticiclónico Una circulación anticiclónica en niveles medios de la atmósfera seguirá dominando el centro, noreste y oriente del país, incluyendo la Ciudad de México.
Este sistema genera condiciones de estabilidad, lo que significa que el cielo se mantendrá mayormente despejado, sin probabilidad de lluvia .
Se anticipa que las noches y madrugadas sean frescas, con un descenso notable de las temperaturas, debido al efecto de la irradiación nocturna; sin embargo, el clima diurno será cálido y agradable , ideal para actividades al aire libre.
Lluvias y chubascos en otras regiones del país Mientras la capital y otras zonas del centro disfrutan de clima seco , diversas regiones del país enfrentarán condiciones lluviosas . Canales de baja presión en el noroeste y occidente, junto con la entrada de humedad del Pacífico, provocarán lluvias y chubascos en estados como B aja California Sur, Sinaloa, Nayarit, Jalisco, Michoacán y Guerrero .
En el sur del país, la interacción de un canal de baja presión en el Golfo de México y la humedad proveniente del Mar Caribe generará lluvias intensas en Veracruz , Tabasco y Chiapas , con acumulados de entre 25 y 50 mm.
Efectos del pronóstico para el viernes 11 de octubre
Lluvias fuertes: Veracruz, Tabasco y Chiapas. Chubascos : Durango, Sinaloa, Jalisco, Michoacán, entre otros. Lluvias aisladas : Baja California Sur, Sonora, Tamaulipas, entre otros. Vientos fuertes : Rachas de 60 a 80 km/h en Oaxaca y Chiapas. Contraste de temperaturas en el territorio nacional El ambiente caluroso prevalecerá en el noroeste y occidente de México, con temperaturas que podrían superar los 40 °C en Baja California, Sonora y Sinaloa .
Por otro lado, se esperan temperaturas mínimas de hasta -5 °C en zonas montañosas de Chihuahua, Durango y Zacatecas , donde podrían presentarse heladas al amanecer del sábado.
Recomendaciones para la población Aunque la Ciudad de México gozará de un clima estable, las autoridades recomiendan a las poblaciones de otras regiones afectadas por lluvias mantenerse alertas ante posibles inundaciones, deslaves o incrementos en los niveles de ríos.
adn40 Siempre Conmigo . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos.

author: Tommaso Bonan
title: Pioli su Leao:
text:
Pioli su Leao: "Continuo a pensare che possa diventare un giocatore da Pallone d'Oro"
Lunghissima intervista per Stefano Pioli, oggi tecnico dell'Al Nassr, che torna a parlare ai microfoni di Radio TV Serie A. Tra i tanti temi toccati, c'è anche un pensiero su Theo Hernandez e Leao: "Hanno di speciale che sono due ragazzi con i quali siamo cresciuti insieme, due ragazzi ai quali ho voluto un bene dell'anima e due ragazzi che secondo me avevano bisogno di certi tipi di rapporti ma al contempo due ragazzi che sono solari, belli, difficili perché non così continui, a volte un po' indolenti. Io con loro ho avuto un bellissimo rapporto, poi a volte mi facevano arrabbiare, perché sono due giocatori che potevano condizionare il risultato della partita sia in positivo che in negativo. Quando li ho conosciuti io erano molto giovani, soprattutto Rafa.
Theo forse era il secondo anno che giocava con continuità, perché era andato dal Real Madrid in prestito ancora in Spagna. E quindi, secondo me, soprattutto arrivando in un campionato così complicato, in un ambiente così dove c'è così tanta pressione, tanta aspettativa, hanno bisogno di essere aiutati, spronati, stimolati. Perché poi aiutarli non vuol dire coccolarli sempre, a volte sì ma a volte vuol dire dargli bastone e carota in ufficio e altre volte davanti a tutti. Insomma è stato un bel lavoro e credo che abbiamo ottenuto successi importanti. Io mi sento il padre calcistico di tutti i giocatori che ho avuto, perché per me e per lo staff il primo obiettivo è sempre stato a fine anno quanti giocatori siamo riusciti a far crescere, secondo chiaramente i nostri principi calcistici ma anche morali. Questo è sempre stato il primo obiettivo. Poi è chiaro che di pari passo va il rispetto delle aspettative del club e quindi di ottenere risultati, ma da allenatore se tu mi chiedi qual è la mia priorità è migliorare il giocatore che ho a disposizione. E per migliorare il giocatore che ho a disposizione non è sufficiente solamente tutto quello che riguarda il campo, ci vuole anche altro secondo me".
Ancora su Leao. "Rafa è un ragazzo stupendo. Ha di brutto (per modo di dire), il suo body language che inganna, ma Rafa è un ragazzo molto intelligente, molto sensibile, molto buono d'animo e che va un po' spronato, stimolato, aiutato. Quello che vedo è che a volte le critiche e gli elogi nel calcio sono sempre eccessivi. Io personalmente continuo a vedere una crescita continua di Rafa. Poi non so se riuscirà a diventare un top e a poter vincere un giorno un pallone d'oro. Io l'ho sempre sostenuto, l'ho sempre detto, continuo a pensare che lui possa diventare un giocatore da pallone d'oro, che la sua crescita sia continua ma dentro la crescita si possono avere a volte dei bassi, ma sarà sempre comunque un giocatore così perché certe caratteristiche rimangono, sempre crescendo e migliorando".

author: Alvin Buyinza
title: Unresponsive child hospitalized with life-threatening injuries, Boston police say - NewsBreak
text:
Boston
Unresponsive child hospitalized with life-threatening injuries, Boston police say
By Alvin Buyinza,
